description: Claude Context MCP Server Installation Configuration

_comments.apiKeys.openai: Your OpenAI API key (sk-...). Leave empty to use OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable
_comments.apiKeys.zilliz: Your Zilliz Cloud API key. Leave empty to use ZILLIZ_API_KEY environment variable
_comments.embeddingProvider: Embedding provider: OpenAI, VoyageAI, Gemini, or Ollama
_comments.embeddingModel: Model name for embeddings. Provider-specific model names
_comments.milvusAddress: Custom Milvus address if not using Zilliz Cloud (optional)
_comments.installation.verbose: Show detailed build output during installation
_comments.installation.createBackup: Backup existing Claude configuration before installing
_comments.installation.skipTests: Skip MCP server functionality tests after installation
_comments.advanced.logLevel: Logging level for the MCP server
_comments.advanced.serverName: Name for the MCP server in Claude configuration
_comments.advanced.serverVersion: Version identifier for the MCP server
_comments.features.realtimeSync.autoEnable: Automatically enable for all indexed codebases (default: false)
_comments.features.realtimeSync.debounceMs: Debounce time for rapid file changes (default: 500)
